channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-14377] LLAP IO: issue with how estimate cache removes unneeded buffers
item.summary: LLAP IO: issue with how estimate cache removes unneeded buffers

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: gopalv prasanth_j can you take a look?
Updated to actually avoid reading such CBs in the reader
